Question: This person threw a 7 yard TD pass on 4th & 6 to rookie tight end Tom Santi to make the deficit 27–17.
Hints: This person passed for 194 yards and a touchdown in the loss.
This person completed 21 of 29 passes for 254 yards, 2 touchdowns and no interceptions.
At the end of the regular season this person was awarded his fourth MVP, breaking the NFL record for most MVPs by a single player.
